cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
from xgboost import XGBClassifier

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
def preprocess_data(df):
    # Fill missing values
    df['Age'].fillna(train_df['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
    df['Fare'].fillna(train_df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
    df.drop(['Cabin', 'Ticket'], axis=1, inplace=True)
    
    # Encode categorical variables
    categorical_features = ['Sex', 'Embarked']
    preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
        transformers=[
            ('num', StandardScaler(), ['Pclass', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare']),
            ('cat', OneHotEncoder(handle_unknown='ignore'), categorical_features)
        ])
    
    return preprocessor.fit_transform(df)

X_train = preprocess_data(train_df.drop(columns=['PassengerId', 'Survived']))
y_train = train_df['Survived']
X_test = preprocess_data(test_df.drop(columns=['PassengerId']))

# Model training
model = XGBClassifier(use_label_encoder=False, eval_metric='logloss')
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predictions
y_pred = model.predict(X_test)

# Create submission file
submission = pd.DataFrame({'PassengerId': test_df['PassengerId'], 'Survived': y_pred})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)

ENDOFFILE

actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
from xgboost import XGBClassifier

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
def preprocess_data(df):
    # Fill missing values
    df['Age'].fillna(train_df['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
    df['Fare'].fillna(train_df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
    df.drop(['Cabin', 'Ticket'], axis=1, inplace=True)
    
    # Encode categorical variables
    categorical_features = ['Sex', 'Embarked']
    preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
        transformers=[
            ('num', StandardScaler(), ['Pclass', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare']),
            ('cat', OneHotEncoder(handle_unknown='ignore'), categorical_features)
        ])
    
    return preprocessor.fit_transform(df)

X_train = preprocess_data(train_df.drop(columns=['PassengerId', 'Survived']))
y_train = train_df['Survived']
X_test = preprocess_data(test_df.drop(columns=['PassengerId']))

# Ensure the test dataset has the same number of features as the training dataset
if X_test.shape[1] != X_train.shape[1]:
    diff = X_train.shape[1] - X_test.shape[1]
    X_test = np.column_stack((X_test, np.zeros((X_test.shape[0], diff))))

# Model training
model = XGBClassifier(use_label_encoder=False, eval_metric='logloss')
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predictions
y_pred = model.predict(X_test)

# Create submission file
submission = pd.DataFrame({'PassengerId': test_df['PassengerId'], 'Survived': y_pred})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)

ENDOFFILE

from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
from xgboost import XGBClassifier

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
def preprocess_data(df):
    # Fill missing values
    df['Age'].fillna(train_df['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
    df['Fare'].fillna(train_df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
    df.drop(['Cabin', 'Ticket'], axis=1, inplace=True)
    
    # Encode categorical variables
    categorical_features = ['Sex', 'Embarked']
    preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
        transformers=[
            ('num', StandardScaler(), ['Pclass', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare']),
            ('cat', OneHotEncoder(handle_unknown='ignore'), categorical_features)
        ])
    
    return preprocessor.fit_transform(df)

X_train = preprocess_data(train_df.drop(columns=['PassengerId', 'Survived']))
y_train = train_df['Survived']
X_test = preprocess_data(test_df.drop(columns=['PassengerId']))

# Ensure the test dataset has the same number of features as the training dataset
if X_test.shape[1] != X_train.shape[1]:
    diff = X_train.shape[1] - X_test.shape[1]
    X_test = np.column_stack((X_test, np.zeros((X_test.shape[0], diff))))

# Predictions
y_pred = model.predict(X_test)

# Create submission file

submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)
